title: What Font Is Used On The Front Of The MasterCard Credit Card logo
content: Does any body know what font is used on the front of the MasterCard Credit Card Logo?
author: Abstract Artist

comments.content: Custom typeface based on Frutiger Bold Italic. [See this thread for more info...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010122841/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14032)

Hi,  
your question had been already answered, read it here:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/node/14032](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010122841/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14032 "http://www.typophile.com/node/14032")

momo  
––  
All Good Cretins Go To Heaven

Thanks for the information.

I am working on a big art project based on the MasterCard credit card and I will post the image when I am done.
